panels.description: The average number of overall transactions per second
panels.title: TPS

panels.description: The average number of consensus submit message transactions per second
panels.title: HCS TPS

panels.description: The average transaction size
panels.title: Transaction Size

panels.description: How old the last processed record file is
panels.title: Record File Age

panels.description: How old the last processed balance file is
panels.title: Balance File Age

panels.description: The transactions per second broken down by type
panels.title: Transaction Rate

panels.description: The amount of time it took to publish the domain entity
panels.title: Publish Duration

panels.description: The rate at which it the importer polls cloud storage for stream files
panels.title: Stream List Rate

panels.description: How long it took to search for new stream files from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_sum{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (action) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (action)

panels.title: Stream Download Latency

panels.description: The rate at which it the importer downloads stream file signatures from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Stream Signature Rate

panels.description: How long it took to download the signature file from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_sum{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Stream Signature Latency

panels.description: The rate at which it the importer downloads stream files from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Stream File Rate

panels.description: How long it took to download stream files from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_sum{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_request_seconds_count{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Stream File Latency

panels.description: The average stream file size

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_sum{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_count{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signed", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Stream File Size

panels.description: The average stream signature file size

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_sum{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_count{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="signature", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Download Signature File Size

panels.description: The average file size of the stream list response from cloud storage

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_sum{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="list", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_response_bytes_count{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type=~"$stream", action="list", status=~"^2.*"}[$__rate_interval])) by (shard, realm, nodeAccount)

panels.title: Stream List Size

panels.description: The rate at which different node's signatures reach consensus
panels.title: Signature Verification Rate

panels.description: The rate at which the stream file reaches consensus, hash chain verified (if applicable) and hash matches signature
panels.title: Stream File Verification Rate

panels.description: The duration in seconds it took to reach consensus,  verify hash chain (if applicable) and hash matches the signature.

targets.expr: sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_stream_verification_seconds_sum{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type="$stream"}[$__rate_interval])) by (success) / sum(rate(hedera_mirror_download_stream_verification_seconds_count{application="$application",namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", type="$stream"}[$__rate_interval])) by (success)

panels.title: Stream File Verification Latency

panels.description: HTTP errors interacting with cloud storage
panels.title: Cloud Storage Error Rate

panels.description: The difference between the consensus time of the last and first transaction in the stream file
panels.title: Stream File Close Interval

panels.description: The duration in seconds it took to parse the file and store it in the database
panels.title: Stream Parse Duration

panels.description: The difference in the consensus time of the last transaction in the file and the time at which the file was processed successfully
panels.title: Consensus to Parsed Latency
